name: PowerPinball
description:
PowerPinball is an exciting, highly addictive pinball machine simulation. The base game consists of  3  different pinball machines and can be played by up to 4 players (in turn, just like the real thing).

Future expansion packs with additional pinball machines are planned.

The game can be played with a keyboard/mouse  or a gamepad.

Features
  • 3 Different pinball machines (base game).
  • Up to 4 players.
  • Play with 3, 4 or 5 balls per game.
  • Adjustable difficulty.
  • Supports Hi-Res screenshots.
  • In-game manual and machine rules.
  • Supports 4:3, 16:9 and 16:10 screenformats.
  • Supports XBOX One Controller.
  • Fully remappable controls.
System Requirements:
  • Windows 10 (64 bit) and up.
  • Intel Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or equivalent.
  • 4 GB RAM.
  • 2048 MB graphics card, DirectX 11 compatible, Shader Model 5.0.
  • 467 MB of free hard drive space (additional space required for hi-score data).
  • Sound card compatible with DirectX 9.0c.
  • Keyboard and mouse.

If you do not wish to buy PowerPinball, but like what we are doing, maybe you want to buy us a coffee (opens in new tab/window).
